title: LTTE threat for Indian VVIPs; Ministry sends alert messages: Training at ‘unknown location’:
content: Indian Central intelligence agencies have communicated specific inputs to the Tamil Nadu police that suspected Liberation Tigers of Tamil Eelam (LTTE) cadres had conspired to carry out attacks on VVIPs during forthcoming Assembly elections.
